en.heroSubtitle: Automate your marketing campaigns and reach thousands of customers with one click. Easy, fast, and secure.
en.ctaStart: ğŸš€ Start Your Free Trial (24 hours)
en.feature1Desc: Bulk or sequential sending to thousands of numbers with high speed and efficiency, with the ability to attach images.
en.feature2Desc: Easily import your customer lists from CSV files without needing to enter numbers manually.
en.feature3Desc: An intelligent delay system between messages to reduce the risk of blocking, with a secure, password-protected control panel.
en.planMonthlyDesc: Perfect for trying out the service or for short seasonal campaigns.
en.planSemiDesc: The best value for ongoing campaigns and achieving growth.
en.planYearlyDesc: The ultimate choice for businesses planning for the long term.
en.howWorksSubtitle: A simple guide to launching your first ad campaign in less than 5 minutes.
en.step1Desc: Register a new account for free. You will get a trial period to test all features before subscribing.
en.step2Desc: From the dashboard, scan the QR Code with your phone to link your number (just like WhatsApp Web).
en.step3Desc: Upload a CSV file with thousands of numbers, or sync your phone contacts with one click.
en.step4Desc: Write your ad message. You can use AI to rephrase it, and attach promotional images.
en.step5Desc: Click 'Send'. The system will send messages with a smart delay to avoid bans, and you can track stats live.
en.loginSubtitle: Welcome back! Please login to continue.
en.signupSubtitle: Welcome! Enter your details to start.
en.emailConfirmDesc: An activation link has been sent to your email address. Please check your inbox (and spam folder) and click the link to complete your registration.
en.activateSubtitle: Please choose a subscription duration to complete the payment:
en.activateNote: First, an activation request will be sent, then you will be redirected to the payment page.
en.validationDesc: Please enter the activation code you received from the administrator to complete the subscription activation.
en.dashHeaderSubtitle: Manage your marketing campaigns with ease from here
en.dashChatbotPromptLabel: Describe your business here (The more details, the better the replies):
en.dashChatbotPromptPlaceholder: Example: I own a shop that sells used phones. We are open from 10 AM to 9 PM. We only deliver within Rabat...
en.disconnectConfirm: Are you sure you want to disconnect? You will need to scan QR code again.
